data.message: Trumps gonna come grab you by your pussy Em and make you his bitch.  Detroit needs to thank their lucky stars Trump won.  Think you can take on the President, you're fucking yourself harder than Trump fucked Hillary out of the presidency.  Keep those devil horns up though, maybe you can go do some spirit cooking with Hillary, she's got the time...lol.

replies.message: I think he just goes after any president that the media considers a joke regardless, but that's just what I think
Detroit was sold out by democrats years ago.
Bravo!! That's what i was thinking too
Yeah for real. I am a huge fan of Em but keep Politics out. You are pissing of the hardworking Americans and the Military/Police etc. You want to dis Trump? Good luck performing in the Middle East

I don't think Em gives half a shit. Lol "Hillary Clinton tried to call me a pervert....I ripped her fucking tonsils out and fed her sherbert" But you're a real fan, right? And that line is even off of Role Model, one of his bigger songs 😂😂😂 Has it ever occurred to you morons that he doesn't like the government at all?
He's just a follower and a liberal kiss ass!

Laura Brown don't act superior. We all know the lyrics. He also had the anti Bush video where he stormed into White House. Did he ever dis Obama in 8 years other than saying Obama took the bomb from my name? Which was not a dis.

And you can't say its a liberal vs conservative thing because he dissed hillary multiple times.

I never said Anarchy, but our goverment is corrupt.
